radiographic_examinations.findings: Delayed myelination with normal size and structure of ventricles and corpus callosum. Normal kidneys, thymus, liver, spleen, and pancreas were visualized.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 3 months, brain atrophy was first noticed in head ultrasound and CT.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Illustrates the endotracheal tube and widespread opacities in both lungs.
Normal at the first 3 months of life.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 3 months, brain atrophy was first noticed.
